items.name: Triple Trouble Oolong
items.description: A guaranteed explosion of textures and flavours with every sip! The Triple Trouble is our team's favourite Milk Tea with chewy tapioca pearls, delicate and light grass jelly and a satisfying vanilla pudding.

items.name: Oolong Pure Tea
items.description: Complex and bold like our Earl Grey Tea, yet light and floral like our Green Jasmine Tea. This unique tea is truly a hidden gem in our menu!

items.name: Oolong Milk Tea
items.description: Low-key, this is our team's favourite Milk Tea. It offers a unique blend of the floral and light Green Jasmine Tea and a strong presence of the Earl Grey Tea.

items.name: Oolong Espresso Milk Tea
items.description: When bold meets bold. Our Oolong Milk Tea combined with Espresso is truly an elevated coffee with cream and sugar.. Or an elevated tea with milk!

items.name: Oolong Peach Tea
items.description: Our unique version of the well-known Peach Ice Tea. You will love it!

items.name: Oolong Lychee Tea
items.description: Lychee, combined with a complex and unique tea. Definitely one of our team's favourite!

items.name: Pure Tea
items.description: Our signature, freshly brewed ORGANIC Green Jasmine Tea. Can be consumed hot or cold. Sweetened by default, please adjust sweetness level to your liking.

items.name: Milk Teas
items.description: Our signature, freshly brewed ORGANIC Earl Grey Tea with our own recipe of non-dairy creamer. Can be consumed hot or cold.

items.name: Matcha Lattea
items.description: Our YOYO! Matcha powder straight from Japan, combined with Soy milk. Perfect for every Matcha lover!

items.name: Matcha Lattea Espresso
items.description: Our YOYO! Matcha powder straight from Japan, combined with Soy milk and a shot of Espresso. Bold flavours guaranteed!

items.name: Coconut Milk
items.description: Our creamy Coconut milkshake is made with our own custom-made ingredients. The best Coconut milkshake you will ever have!

items.name: Brown Sugar Milk Tea
items.description: Our signature, freshly brewed ORGANIC Green Jasmine Tea with our own recipe of non-dairy creamer and brown sugar syrup.

items.name: Taro Coconut Milk
items.description: BESTSELLER: A creamy and sweet milkshake of Coconut milk, Taro (purple coloured sweet potato with a sweet vanilla and cookies flavour) and our unique creamer.

items.name: Taro Milk Tea
items.description: Our signature, freshly brewed ORGANIC Earl Grey Tea with our own recipe of non-dairy creamer and Taro.

items.name: Peach Soda & Yakult
items.description: Our favourite! Freshly brewed ORGANIC Green Jasmine iced tea with Peach syrup, fresh Lemon wheels, probiotic drink Yakult Plus and topped with sparkling water.

items.name: Orange Blend
items.description: REFRESHING ICED TEA ALERT! Fresh Orange Juice with Watermelon syrup and our freshly brewed ORGANIC Green Jasmine Tea.

items.name: Honey Mint
items.description: Classic iced tea with great quality honey, freshly brewed ORGANIC Green Jasmine tea, fresh mint leaves and fresh lime.

items.name: Green Tea & Yakult
items.description: A very unique refreshing and creamy iced tea: freshly brewed ORGANIC Green Jasmine Tea with probiotic drink Yakult Plus and fresh lime.

items.name: Strawberry Mint
items.description: BESTSELLER! This sweet iced tea is made with our ORGANIC Green Jasmine Tea, strawberry syrup, fresh mint leaves and fresh lime.

items.name: Hong Kong Lemon Tea
items.description: Our ORGANIC Earl Grey Tea with fresh lemons and a touch of sugar makes a perfectly refreshing iced tea!

items.name: Lychee
items.description: Our ORGANIC Green Jasmine iced tea with a sweet Lychee fruit flavour.

items.name: Strawberry
items.description: Our ORGANIC Green Jasmine iced tea with a sweet Strawberry flavour.

items.name: Lemon
items.description: Our ORGANIC Green Jasmine iced tea with a refreshing Lemon flavour.

items.name: Honeydew Melon
items.description: Our ORGANIC Green Jasmine iced tea with a sweet Honeydew Melon flavour.

items.name: Mango
items.description: Our ORGANIC Green Jasmine iced tea with a sweet and unforgettable Mango flavour.

items.name: Passionfruit
items.description: Our ORGANIC Green Jasmine iced tea with a sweet Passionfruit pulp and Passionfruit seeds.

items.name: Matcha Strawberry
items.description: Matcha Meets Strawberry! Earthy matcha and sweet strawberries swirl into one creamy, dreamy iced drink.

items.name: Matcha Mango
items.description: A vibrant blend of earthy Japanese matcha and sweet tropical mango, shaken to perfection with your choice of milk.

items.name: Black Sesame Chocolate Milk Tea
items.description: Our aromatic Green Jasmine Tea with rich cocoa and milk, married with a toasty black sesame wave of flavours.

items.name: Rose Coconut Milk Tea
items.description: Spread the love with our Rose Coconut Milk Tea! Infused with a hint of rose, it is the coconut milk tea reinvented!

items.name: Chocolate Milk Tea
items.description: Our aromatic Green Jasmine Tea with rich cocoa and milk. Smooth, rich and satisfying!

items.name: Pumpkin Spice Espresso Milk Tea
items.description: Heartwarming and soothing, a must drink in the cold season of the year!

items.name: Lychee Sunset
items.description: A very refreshing and easy to like drink for everyone. Based on a nutty Oolong Tea combined with sweet Lychees and balanced with Lemons and Mandarins.

items.name: The Special Coconut
items.description: It's so special, it's just like an Asian dessert! Our own Coconut milkshake combined with aromatic Pandan flavours.

items.name: The Special Coconut Cookie
items.description: Fragrant pandan and creamy coconut come together in our cookie.

items.name: Matcha Strawberry Cookie
items.description: Earthy Japanese matcha and sweet strawberry jam.

items.name: Ube Cookie
items.description: Ube (purple yam) cookie packed with ube, premium white chocolate, shredded coconut flakes and bits of macadamia nuts.

items.name: Matcha White Choco Cookie
items.description: Organic high quality matcha (green tea) crunchy soft cookie filled with white premium chocolate.

items.name: Kinder Bueno Cookie
items.description: A big vanilla cookie with a creamy hazelnut filling, premium milk chocolate and topped with a Kinder Bueno wafer.

items.name: Birthday Cookie
items.description: Vanilla cookie, premium white chocolate callets and celebration sprinkles!
